quotes.quote: Summertime is always the best of what might be.
Some of the best memories are made in flip flops.
Rejoice as summer should chase away sorrows by living.
Ah, summer, what power you have to make us suffer and like it.
A life without love is like a year without summer.
If it could only be like this always   always summer, always alone, the fruit always ripe
It's a smile, it's a kiss, it's a sip of wine   it's summertime!
Celebrate Summer - Sun drenched days and starlit nights
In summer, the song sings itself.
Sun is shining. Weather is sweet. Make you wanna move your dancing feet.
A perfect summer day is when the sun is shining, the breeze is blowing, the birds are singing, and the lawn mower is broken.
A summer's sun is worth the having.
Summer is where the girls go barefoot and their hearts are just as free as their toes.
Breathless, we flung us on a windy hill, laughed in the sun, and kissed the lovely grass.
Summer means happy times and good sunshine. It means going to the beach, going to Disneyland, having fun.
Let us dance in the sun, wearing wild flowers in our hair
Summer brings sunshine, warm and flowering.

Summer is the time when one sheds one's tensions with one's clothes, and the right kind of day is jeweled balm for the battered spirit. A few of those days and you can become drunk with the belief that all's right with the world.
Summer: Hair gets lighter. Skin gets darker. Water gets warmer. Drinks get colder. Music gets louder. Nights get longer. Life gets better.
Because it's summer and the memories are just waiting to happen.
People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy.
A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.
I wonder what it would be like to live in a world where it was always June.
If you saw a heat wave, would you wave back?
I am Summer, come to lure you away from your computer  come dance on my fresh grass, dig your toes into my beaches.
It was June, and the world smelled of roses. The sunshine was like powdered gold over the grassy hillside.
It's summer and time for wandering
